definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: This is called special power, here is an Ace, I only have to rub it lightly.
sentences.chinese: 呢啲就叫特異功能，呢度有隻A士，只要我輕輕一搓。

sentences.english: Specific function structure on the surface of cell differentiated poorly.
sentences.chinese: 細胞表面特異功能結構分化不良。

sentences.english: She claims to be psychic and to be able to foretell the future.
sentences.chinese: 她自稱有特異功能，能預知未來。

sentences.english: You are very charismatic and have an uncanny ability to put others at ease.
sentences.chinese: 你是個很有魅力且有讓人心平和的特異功能。

sentences.english: And that killing goats with psychic powers was just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 而用特異功能使山羊斃命僅僅是冰山一角而已。

sentences.english: You mean mice with special powers?
sentences.chinese: 你是說有特異功能的老鼠？

definition: indirect, psychological method of getting sb to do as one wishes (e.g. questioning whether they are up to the task)
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
